import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Image, Icon, Card, Divider } from "semantic-ui-react"; import AOS from "aos"; import charlotte from "./images/charlotte.jpg"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; export default class Profile extends Component { componentDidMount() { AOS.init(); } render() { return (

Charlotte Mountain

Nashville

Yes, my last name is actually 'Mountain'. I am a southern california native, currently residing with my fiancé and our cats in Nashville. Pursuing the dream of becoming a Web Developer leveraging a background in customer service to build a more intuitive user experience on the web.

I enjoy problem-solving and learning, whether it relates to programming or human behavior. I'm a naturally curious, adaptable person who is eager to tackle any challenge that comes my way.

Recently earned a Certificate in Full Stack Development from the University of California San Diego Extension, with developed skills in JavaScript, CSS, Node.js, JQuery, MySQL and responsive web design. With each project, my aim is to best engage my audience for an impactful user experience. Excited to leverage my skills in the future as part of a fast-paced, quality-driven team! Just trying to be the best cat mom I can be.

); } }
